items.title: Unilever hit ‘new levels of oppressiveness,’ Ben & Jerry’s claims as its CEO was sacked over his refusal to ‘silence the social mission’
items.description: David Stever had been with Ben & Jerry’s for 34 years in total. Ben & Jerry's claims Unilever didn't oust him for performance reasons.

items.title: Exclusive: Crypto wallet infrastructure company Privy raises $15 million in round led by Ribbit Capital
items.description: The company will use the money to double the size of its team in the next 18 months.

items.title: America’s happiest city: over a thousand acres of parks, average temperatures in the 60s, and a bustling economy
Successful women leaders have P&L experience—but many are getting it too late to shape their career trajectories
items.description: P&L roles are critical for making it to the C-suite.

items.title: Scared Tesla owners are petitioning Elon Musk to add a feature that would warn off vandals as more cars are set on fire
items.description: Owners worry they are being targeted due to anger over CEO Elon Musk involvement in the Trump administration: "There definitely is fear right now."
